rooms.description: A welcoming entryway with natural light and minimalistic design. Vastu-compliant orientation (north) to invite positive energy.
Spacious living area centered around the courtyard for optimal ventilation and natural light.
Dining space adjacent to the living room. Incorporates eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient lighting.
Modern kitchen with energy-saving appliances and ventilation system that aligns with Vastu guidelines (east facing for fire element).
Primary bathroom designed with water-saving fixtures and a natural ventilation scheme.

openings.description: Large entry door that is eco-friendly, insulated, and Vastu compliant (north for positive energy).
Energy-efficient double glazed windows that maximize natural light while providing insulation.
